verses.verse: Moreover, from the <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8278>finely<s%> <S%H8278>woven<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, as well as the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were for <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> [and] of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] and <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen.<s%>

Then they <S%H7554>hammered<s%> out <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H9449>sheets<s%> and <S%H7112>cut<s%> [them] into <S%H6616>threads<s%> to be <S%H6213>woven<s%> in [with] the <S%H8504>blue<s%> and the <S%H713>purple<s%> and the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] and the <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H2803>workman.<s%>
They <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2266>attaching<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> pieces for the ephod; it was <S%H2266>attached<s%> at its <S%H8147>two<s%> [upper] <S%H7117>ends.<s%>

And the <S%H2805>skillfully<s%> <S%H2805>woven<s%> <S%H2805>band<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was on it was like its <S%H4639>workmanship,<s%> of the <S%H4480>same<s%> material: of <S%H2091>gold<s%> [and] of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] and <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H5437>set<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4865>filigree<s%> [settings;] they were <S%H9466>engraved<s%> [like] the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>placed<s%> them on the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> pieces of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> [as] <S%H2146>memorial<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2833>breastpiece,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H2803>workman,<s%> like the <S%H4639>workmanship<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod:<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> [and] of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material] and <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen.<s%>

It was <S%H7251>square;<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2833>breastpiece<s%> <S%H3717>folded<s%> <S%H3717>double,<s%> a <S%H2239>span<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> and a <S%H2239>span<s%> <S%H7341>wide<s%> when <S%H3717>folded<s%> <S%H3717>double.<s%>

And they <S%H4390>mounted<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> on it. The <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%> [was] a <S%H2905>row<s%> of <S%H124>ruby,<s%> <S%H6357>topaz,<s%> and <S%H1304>emerald;<s%>
and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2905>row,<s%> a <S%H5306>turquoise,<s%> a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%> and a <S%H3095>diamond;<s%>
and the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2905>row,<s%> a <S%H3958>jacinth,<s%> an <S%H7618>agate,<s%> and an <S%H306>amethyst;<s%>

and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2905>row,<s%> a <S%H8658>beryl,<s%> an <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> and a <S%H3471>jasper.<s%> They were <S%H5437>set<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4865>filigree<s%> [settings] when they were <S%H4396>mounted.<s%>

And the <S%H68>stones<s%> were <S%H5921>corresponding<s%> to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> they were <S%H8147>twelve,<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5921>corresponding<s%> to their <S%H8034>names,<s%> [engraved with] the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> with its <S%H8034>name<s%> for the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> on the <S%H2833>breastpiece<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> like <S%H5688>cords,<s%> of <S%H1383>twisted<s%> <S%H5688>cordage<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> in <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4865>filigree<s%> [settings] and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastpiece.<s%>
Then they <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5688>cords<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> at the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastpiece.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>put<s%> the [other] <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5688>cords<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>filigree<s%> [settings,] and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> pieces of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> at the <S%H6440>front<s%> of it.

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> and <S%H7760>placed<s%> [them] on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastpiece,<s%> on its <S%H1004>inner<s%> <S%H8193>edge<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H413>next<s%> <S%H5676><s%> to the <S%H646>ephod.<s%>

Furthermore, they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> and <S%H5414>placed<s%> them on the <S%H4295>bottom<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> pieces of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> on the <S%H6440>front<s%> of it, <S%H5980>close<s%> to the <S%H4225>place<s%> <S%H4225>where<s%> it <S%H4225>joined,<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> the <S%H2805>woven<s%> <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod.<s%>

And they <S%H7405>bound<s%> the <S%H2833>breastpiece<s%> by its <S%H2885>rings<s%> to the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> with a <S%H8504>blue<s%> <S%H6616>cord,<s%> that it might be on the <S%H2805>woven<s%> <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and that the <S%H2833>breastpiece<s%> might not <S%H2118>come<s%> <S%H2118>loose<s%> from the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> <S%H3632>all<s%> of <S%H8504>blue;<s%>

and the <S%H6310>opening<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> was [at the top] in the <S%H8432>center,<s%> as the <S%H6310>opening<s%> of a <S%H8473>coat<s%> of <S%H8473>mail,<s%> with a <S%H8193>binding<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> its <S%H6310>opening,<s%> that it might not be <S%H7167>torn.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material and] <S%H7806>twisted<s%> [linen] on the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe.<s%>

They also <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6472>bells<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6472>bells<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of the <S%H7757>robe,<s%>

alternating a <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of the <S%H7757>robe,<s%> for the <S%H8334>service,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3801>tunics<s%> of <S%H8336>finely<s%> <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%>

and the <S%H4701>turban<s%> of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and the <S%H6287>decorated<s%> <S%H4021>caps<s%> of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%>

and the <S%H73>sash<s%> of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7806>twisted<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H7551>weaver,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6731>plate<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3789>inscribed<s%> it like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet,<s%> <S%H6944>"Holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

And they <S%H5414>fastened<s%> a <S%H8504>blue<s%> <S%H6616>cord<s%> to it, to <S%H5414>fasten<s%> it on the <S%H4701>turban<s%> <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Thus <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> was <S%H3615>completed;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H6213>did.<s%>

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>furnishings:<s%> its <S%H7165>clasps,<s%> its <S%H7175>boards,<s%> its <S%H1280>bars,<s%> and its <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and its <S%H134>sockets;<s%>

and the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of rams' <S%H5785>skins<s%> <S%H119>dyed<s%> <S%H119>red,<s%> and the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screening<s%> <S%H6532>veil;<s%>
the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> and its <S%H905>poles<s%> and the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat;<s%>
the <S%H7979>table,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6440>Presence;<s%>

the <S%H2889>pure<s%> [gold] <S%H4501>lampstand,<s%> with its <S%H4634>arrangement<s%> of <S%H5216>lamps<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light;<s%>

and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and the <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and the <S%H4539>veil<s%> for the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent;<s%>

the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> and its <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4346>grating,<s%> its <S%H905>poles<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and its <S%H3653>stand;<s%>

the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> for the <S%H2691>court,<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and its <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> its <S%H4340>cords<s%> and its <S%H3489>pegs<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>equipment<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting;<s%>

the <S%H8278>woven<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> to <S%H3547>minister<s%> as <S%H3547>priests.<s%>

So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7200>examined<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they had <S%H6213>done<s%> it; <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H3651>this<s%> they had <S%H6213>done.<s%> So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them.
